name: Keep the Beet Alive
description:
You are a Beetroot

There you are, minding your own business while listening to your favourite songs. Suddenly, a horde of snails descend upon you. Well, that’s just not on. It’s time to fight back.

So grab your salt shaker, your best headphones, and a can-do attitude: It’s time to slug these snails.

How to Play What to do

Use the reticule to aim at incoming snails, and tap in time with the beat to rebuff and damage them, buying you precious time.

The game is over when the Beet has taken too much damage.

Controls InteractionUseMouse
Aim the reticule
SpacebarTap in time with the beat to attack
QExit to the main menu
